verses.verse: וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> took שְׁמוּאֵ֜ל <WH8050> Then Samuel אֶת־ <WH853> פַּ֥ךְ <WH6378> a vial הַשֶּׁ֛מֶן <WH8081> of oil וַיִּצֹ֥ק <WH3332> and poured עַל־ <WH5921> over רֹאשׁ֖וֹ <WH7218> [it] upon his head וַיִּשָּׁקֵ֑הוּ <WH5401> and kissed וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> him and said הֲל֗וֹא <WH3808> not כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מְשָׁחֲךָ֧ <WH4886> hath anointed יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> [Is it] not because the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> over נַחֲלָת֖וֹ <WH5159> heritage לְנָגִֽיד׃ <WH5057> thee [to be] captain

בְּלֶכְתְּךָ֤ <WH1980> which thou wentest הַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> to day מֵעִמָּדִ֔י <WH5978> from me וּמָצָאתָ֩ <WH4672> then thou shalt find שְׁנֵ֨י <WH8147> two אֲנָשִׁ֜ים <WH376> men עִם־ <WH5973> close קְבֻרַ֥ת <WH6900> sepulchre רָחֵ֛ל <WH7354> by Rachel's בִּגְב֥וּל <WH1366> in the border בִּנְיָמִ֖ן <WH1144> of Benjamin בְּצֶלְצַ֑ח <WH6766> at Zelzah וְאָמְר֣וּ <WH559> and they will say אֵלֶ֗יךָ <WH413> about נִמְצְא֤וּ <WH4672> are found הָאֲתֹנוֹת֙ <WH860> unto thee The asses אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הָלַ֣כְתָּ <WH1980> went לְבַקֵּ֔שׁ <WH1245> to seek וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> now behold נָטַ֤שׁ <WH5203> hath left אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <WH1> and lo thy father אֶת־ <WH853> דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> the care הָאֲתֹנ֔וֹת <WH860> of the asses וְדָאַ֤ג <WH1672> and sorroweth לָכֶם֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> for you saying מָ֥ה <WH4100> What אֶעֱשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> What shall I do לִבְנִֽי׃ <WH1121> you

וְחָלַפְתָּ֨ <WH2498> Then shalt thou go on מִשָּׁ֜ם <WH8033> there וָהָ֗לְאָה <WH1973> forward וּבָ֙אתָ֙ <WH935> from thence and thou shalt come עַד־ <WH5704> far אֵל֣וֹן <WH436> to the plain תָּב֔וֹר <WH8396> of Tabor וּמְצָא֤וּךָ <WH4672> and there shall meet שָּׁם֙ <WH8033> and there שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> thee three אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH582> men עֹלִ֥ים <WH5927> going up אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> to God בֵּֽית־ אֵ֑ל <WH1008> to Bethel אֶחָ֞ד <WH259> one נֹשֵׂ֣א ׀ <WH5375> carrying שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> three גְדָיִ֗ים <WH1423> kids וְאֶחָד֙ <WH259> and another נֹשֵׂ֗א <WH5375> carrying שְׁלֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH7969> three כִּכְּר֣וֹת <WH3603> loaves לֶ֔חֶם <WH3899> of bread וְאֶחָ֥ד <WH259> and another נֹשֵׂ֖א <WH5375> carrying נֵֽבֶל־ <WH5035> a bottle יָֽיִן׃ <WH3196> of wine

וְשָׁאֲל֥וּ <WH7592> And they will לְךָ֖ לְשָׁל֑וֹם <WH7965> salute וְנָתְנ֤וּ <WH5414> thee and give לְךָ֙ שְׁתֵּי־ <WH8147> thee two לֶ֔חֶם <WH3899> [loaves] of bread וְלָקַחְתָּ֖ <WH3947> which thou shalt receive מִיָּדָֽם׃ <WH3027> of their hands

אַ֣חַר <WH310> After כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> after that תָּבוֹא֙ <WH935> that thou shalt come גִּבְעַ֣ת <WH1389> to the hill הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there נְצִבֵ֣י <WH5333> where [is] the garrison פְלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וִיהִי֩ <WH1961> become כְבֹאֲךָ֨ <WH935> and it shall come to pass when thou art come thither שָׁ֜ם <WH8033> there הָעִ֗יר <WH5892> to the city וּפָגַעְתָּ֞ <WH6293> that thou shalt meet חֶ֤בֶל <WH2256> a company נְבִיאִים֙ <WH5030> of prophets יֹרְדִ֣ים <WH3381> coming down מֵֽהַבָּמָ֔ה <WH1116> from the high place וְלִפְנֵיהֶ֞ם <WH6440> before נֵ֤בֶל <WH5035> with a psaltery וְתֹף֙ <WH8596> and a tabret וְחָלִ֣יל <WH2485> and a pipe וְכִנּ֔וֹר <WH3658> and a harp וְהֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> and they מִֽתְנַבְּאִֽים׃ <WH5012> them and they shall prophesy

וְצָלְחָ֤ה <WH6743> will come עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5921> Then ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> And the Spirit יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְהִתְנַבִּ֖יתָ <WH5012> upon thee and thou shalt prophesy עִמָּ֑ם <WH5973> them וְנֶהְפַּכְתָּ֖ <WH2015> with them and shalt be turned לְאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> man אַחֵֽר׃ <WH312> into another

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> become כִּ֥י <WH3588> shall be when [תְבֹאֶינָה כ] (תָבֹ֛אנָה <WH935> abide ק) הָאֹת֥וֹת <WH226> And let it be when these signs הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these לָ֑ךְ עֲשֵׂ֤ה <WH6213> unto thee [that] thou do לְךָ֙ אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> what תִּמְצָ֣א <WH4672> as occasion יָדֶ֔ךָ <WH3027> serve כִּ֥י <WH3588> shall be when הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> thee for God עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> and you

וְיָרַדְתָּ֣ <WH3381> And thou shalt go down לְפָנַי֮ <WH6440> before הַגִּלְגָּל֒ <WH1537> me to Gilgal וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> and behold אָֽנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I יֹרֵ֣ד <WH3381> and behold I will come down אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> to you לְהַעֲל֣וֹת <WH5927> unto thee to offer עֹל֔וֹת <WH5930> burnt offerings לִזְבֹּ֖חַ <WH2076> [and] to sacrifice זִבְחֵ֣י <WH2077> sacrifices שְׁלָמִ֑ים <WH8002> of peace offerings שִׁבְעַ֨ת <WH7651> seven יָמִ֤ים <WH3117> days תּוֹחֵל֙ <WH3176> shalt thou tarry עַד־ <WH5704> until בּוֹאִ֣י <WH935> till I come אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> to you וְהוֹדַעְתִּ֣י <WH3045> to thee and shew לְךָ֔ אֵ֖ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> what תַּעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> thee what thou shalt do

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> happened כְּהַפְנֹת֤וֹ <WH6437> And it was [so] that when he had turned שִׁכְמוֹ֙ <WH7926> his back לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <WH1980> along מֵעִ֣ם <WH5973> with שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <WH8050> from Samuel וַיַּהֲפָךְ־ <WH2015> gave ל֥וֹ אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> God לֵ֣ב <WH3820> heart אַחֵ֑ר <WH312> him another וַיָּבֹ֛אוּ <WH935> came כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הָאֹת֥וֹת <WH226> and all those signs הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> those בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> to pass that day הַהֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he ס

וַיָּבֹ֤אוּ <WH935> And when they came שָׁם֙ <WH8033> there הַגִּבְעָ֔תָה <WH1389> thither to the hill וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold חֶֽבֶל־ <WH2256> behold a company נְבִאִ֖ים <WH5030> of prophets לִקְרָאת֑וֹ <WH7122> met וַתִּצְלַ֤ח <WH6743> came עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> and ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> him and the Spirit אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God וַיִּתְנַבֵּ֖א <WH5012> upon him and he prophesied בְּתוֹכָֽם׃ <WH8432> among

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came כָּל־ <WH3605> all יֽוֹדְעוֹ֙ <WH3045> And it came to pass when all that knew מֵאִתְּמ֣וֹל <WH865> before time שִׁלְשׁ֔וֹם <WH8032> before that time וַיִּרְא֕וּ <WH7200> saw וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> now עִם־ <WH5973> with נְבִאִ֖ים <WH5030> among the prophets נִבָּ֑א <WH5012> that behold he prophesied וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> then the people אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> one אֶל־ <WH413> about רֵעֵ֗הוּ <WH7453> to another מַה־ <WH4100> What זֶּה֙ <WH2088> he הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> has happened לְבֶן־ <WH1121> What [is] this [that] is come unto the son קִ֔ישׁ <WH7027> Kish הֲגַ֥ם <WH1571> also שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> Saul בַּנְּבִיאִֽים׃ <WH5030> the prophets

וַיַּ֨עַן <WH6030> of the same place answered אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> And one מִשָּׁ֛ם <WH8033> in it וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> and said וּמִ֣י <WH4310> now who אֲבִיהֶ֑ם <WH1> fathers עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּן֙ <WH3651> it הָיְתָ֣ה <WH1961> became לְמָשָׁ֔ל <WH4912> A proverb הֲגַ֥ם <WH1571> also שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> [Is] Saul בַּנְּבִאִֽים׃ <WH5030> prophecy
וַיְכַל֙ <WH3615> And when he had made an end מֵֽהִתְנַבּ֔וֹת <WH5012> of prophesying וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> he came הַבָּמָֽה׃ <WH1116> to the high place

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said דּ֨וֹד <WH1730> uncle שָׁא֥וּל <WH7586> And Saul's אֵלָ֛יו <WH413> about וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> to him נַעֲר֖וֹ <WH5288> unto him and to his servant אָ֣ן <WH575> Whither הֲלַכְתֶּ֑ם <WH1980> went וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> ye? And he said לְבַקֵּשׁ֙ <WH1245> To seek אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣אֲתֹנ֔וֹת <WH860> the asses וַנִּרְאֶ֣ה <WH7200> and when we saw כִי־ <WH3588> could אַ֔יִן <WH369> that [they were] no where וַנָּב֖וֹא <WH935> we came אֶל־ <WH413> to שְׁמוּאֵֽל׃ <WH8050> to Samuel

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> said דּ֣וֹד <WH1730> uncle שָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> And Saul's הַגִּֽידָה־ <WH5046> Tell נָּ֣א <WH4994> Please לִ֔י מָֽה־ <WH4100> what אָמַ֥ר <WH559> said לָכֶ֖ם שְׁמוּאֵֽל׃ <WH8050> me I pray thee what Samuel

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> And Saul אֶל־ <WH413> to his דּוֹד֔וֹ <WH1730> unto his uncle הַגֵּ֤ד <WH5046> He told הִגִּיד֙ <WH5046> us plainly לָ֔נוּ כִּ֥י <WH3588> for נִמְצְא֖וּ <WH4672> were found הָאֲתֹנ֑וֹת <WH860> that the asses וְאֶת־ <WH853> דְּבַ֤ר <WH1697> But of the matter הַמְּלוּכָה֙ <WH4410> of the kingdom לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not הִגִּ֣יד <WH5046> he told ל֔וֹ אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which אָמַ֥ר <WH559> spake שְׁמוּאֵֽל׃ <WH8050> whereof Samuel פ
וַיַּצְעֵ֤ק <WH6817> called שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <WH8050> And Samuel אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> the people אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> together unto the LORD הַמִּצְפָּֽה׃ <WH4709> to Mizpeh

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <WH559> And said אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel פ כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> I הֶעֱלֵ֥יתִי <WH5927> I brought up אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt וָאַצִּ֤יל <WH5337> and delivered אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> you out of the hand מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of the Egyptians וּמִיַּד֙ <WH3027> and out of the hand כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הַמַּמְלָכ֔וֹת <WH4467> of all kingdoms הַלֹּחֲצִ֖ים <WH3905> [and] of them that oppressed אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853>

וְאַתֶּ֨ם <WH859> you הַיּ֜וֹם <WH3117> And ye have this day מְאַסְתֶּ֣ם <WH3988> rejected אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֗ם <WH430> your God אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who ה֣וּא <WH1931> he מוֹשִׁ֣יעַ <WH3467> who himself saved לָכֶם֮ מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all רָעוֹתֵיכֶ֣ם <WH7451> you out of all your adversities וְצָרֹֽתֵיכֶם֒ <WH6869> and your tribulations וַתֹּ֣אמְרוּ <WH559> and ye have said ל֔וֹ כִּי־ <WH3588> for מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> a king תָּשִׂ֣ים <WH7760> unto him [Nay] but set עָלֵ֑ינוּ <WH5921> over וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now הִֽתְיַצְּבוּ֙ <WH3320> over us Now therefore present לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> yourselves before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD לְשִׁבְטֵיכֶ֖ם <WH7626> by your tribes וּלְאַלְפֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH505> and by your thousands

וַיַּקְרֵ֣ב <WH7126> to come near שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <WH8050> And when Samuel אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all שִׁבְטֵ֣י <WH7626> had caused all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיִּלָּכֵ֖ד <WH3920> was taken שֵׁ֥בֶט <WH7626> the tribe בִּנְיָמִֽן׃ <WH1144> of Benjamin

וַיַּקְרֵ֞ב <WH7126> to come near אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁ֤בֶט <WH7626> When he had caused the tribe בִּנְיָמִן֙ <WH1144> of Benjamin [לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתֹו כ] (לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֔יו <WH4940> families ק) וַתִּלָּכֵ֖ד <WH3920> was taken מִשְׁפַּ֣חַת <WH4940> by their families הַמַּטְרִ֑י <WH4309> of Matri וַיִּלָּכֵד֙ <WH3920> was taken שָׁא֣וּל <WH7586> and Saul בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son קִ֔ישׁ <WH7027> of Kish וַיְבַקְשֻׁ֖הוּ <WH1245> and when they sought וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> could נִמְצָֽא׃ <WH4672> him he could not be found

וַיִּשְׁאֲלוּ־ <WH7592> Therefore they enquired עוֹד֙ <WH5750> further בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD הֲבָ֥א <WH935> should yet come ע֖וֹד <WH5750> further הֲלֹ֣ם <WH1988> thither אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> further if the man ס וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> answered יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> And the LORD הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold ה֥וּא <WH1931> himself נֶחְבָּ֖א <WH2244> Behold he hath hid אֶל־ <WH413> by הַכֵּלִֽים׃ <WH3627> himself among the stuff
